About Artsy Daria Photography

In business since 2008

Every wedding I photograph I experience an excitement as if it was a wedding of my best friends! Dresses, tuxedos, flowers, rings and these all are surrounded by the ocean of love and happiness! And every time I feel like a part of this ocean, but most important that I am the one who’s in charge of capturing this engrossing moment for the future generations! Isn’t that the most honorable and thrilling mission?!:)

I have over a 100 weddings under my belt! Each of them was unique and special for me. I remember all of my brides and grooms by name, sometimes even their moms' :) How can I forget people who trusted me to photograph their The Most Vital Day!

Photography is my love and passion – I love working with people and I am passionate about creating photographs to be treasured and shared for years to come.

wedding photography Resident Expert

Congratulations! You've picked a true professional. artsy daria photography is a Wedding Venture resident expert on wedding photography in Seattle, WA and is highly regarded in the industry. Read published interviews below.

The wedding photos process   January 2018

Daria from Artsy Daria Photography is a highly regarded Seattle wedding photographer. Below, Daria shares tips and tricks for choosing a great wedding photographer, explains the wedding photos process and associated costs, and answers many more.... Read full interview

Pricing

Budget package $1,800

Includes up to 4 hours, multiple locations, gallery and more.

Standard package $2,800

Includes up to 6 hours, multiple locations and photographers, gallery, professional prints, handmade leather album and more.

Prime package $3,800

Includes as many hours as you need, engagement session, multiple locations and photographers, gallery, professional prints, albums and more.

Stephanie N

| May 28 '18 at 12:43 PM

Daria, our photos are so amazing. I absolutely love them! Really, you are incredible – they have surpassed all our expectations – I found it so hard to pick my faves and I can’t stop looking at them! The portraits of us are so beautiful -that light! Incredible. We will treasure them for ever. Thank you, thank you, thank you!

Emily R

| Jun 12 '18 at 10:20 PM

I don’t even know where to start... I can’t believe how perfect our wedding pictures are. You have exceeded all our expectations, we love them! You saw our vision and totally delivered. Your attention to detail, your angles, and the images with the really different lighting and shadows are so amazing, I’m still soaking them all in. Besides, your second photographer is so creative as well! This was an amazing experience!Thank you again!

KV

Kelsey V

| Jun 30 '18 at 12:00 PM

Too many people have told us ours are the best wedding photos they have ever seen for it to be just flattery. Daria knew what we wanted, and was honest enough to tell us what he needed to do to capture that. The result was a series of spontaneous moments captured to make a dazzling whole, which tells the story of the day perfectly. Daria has given us something timeless and beautiful, all done in the most unobtrusive style

We are so thankful that we had someone so accomodating, conscientious, and most of all, talented to document the most important day of our lives. Book her, you won't be disappointed.

GW

Ginny Wolfe

| Jul 11 '18 at 08:08 PM

From the moment we met Daria we knew Artsy Daria Photography were for us. Their level of skill and professionalism are second to none. We loved how Daria and her assistant capture the REALITY of weddings. Daria took away the stress of worrying about how we looked. Daria and Elena were focused, professional and attentive behind the lens and so much fun during all the bits in between. Group shots were smooth and efficient, then individual shots were great fun. Thank you Artsy Daria Photography for capturing such fabulous and artistic images of the best day of our lives!

Was this post useful? yes no
E

Eugenia

| Aug 01 '18 at 09:22 AM

Daria was absolutely brilliant from start to finish. She was efficient, professional, friendly and, most importantly, took the most amazing photographs of our wedding in what one would consider freezing conditions. We felt that Daria really made the effort to get to know us beforehand and ensured that the photos of our wedding reflected our personalities which offered a really nice personal touch. On receiving our album, the photos tell the story of our day from start to finish and brings back every happy feeling from photo to photo. The album is absolutely beautiful and detailed. Unless you are holding it yourself, I cannot describe the quality and simplicity of it. As you may be aware, simplicity is the ultimate sophistication and the album has that in spades. Daria is truly talented and captured everything and we will treasure these forever. With all our hearts, thank you!!

All our guests commented on how nice and easy going they were there was no fuss they had everyone at ease. Would definitely recommend them to anyone their work is amazing, we couldn't have asked for better.

From the first moment we met Daria we got on famously and she made us feel so relaxed and comfortable with the camera. We also liked the fact that she prefers to mix in many natural shots rather than everything being posed. Thanks!
